#summary Getting Started.

= Compile and Install =

cd totem-plugin-timer

./configure

make

sudo make install


= Enable plugin in totem =

Under 'Edit' pull-down menu, select "Plugins".  In 'Configure Plugins' pop-up window, click button at left of plugin labelled 'Timer'.

= Using plugin =

Method 1: Under 'Movie' pull-down menu, select 'Delete':
http://totem-plugin-timer.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/timer_pull_down.jpg

Method 2: Right click in video window:
http://totem-plugin-timer.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/timer_right_click.jpg
